summary.span: 計算兩個值的邏輯 AND。

span.span: Computes the logical AND of two values.

summary.span: 兩個值均轉換成布林值，且若皆為 true，則此運算式會傳回 。

span.span: Both values are converted into Boolean, and if both are true then this expression returns .

summary.span: 如果其中一或兩個值評估為 false，則運算式會傳回 。

span.span: If one or both values evaluate to false, this expression returns .

summary.span: 是邏輯 AND 運算子的「最少運算」版本，會在判定運算元為 後立即傳回 false。

span.span: is the "short circuit" version of the logical AND operator, returning false as soon as one of operands is evaluated to be .
